title: What time does Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker trailer land in the UK?
text:
The hype for the next instalment is very real (Pictures: AP/Rex)

The final Star Wars: Episode IX -The Rise of Skywalker trailer is due to land very soon and frankly, it’s getting hard to handle the hype.

As we inch closer and closer to the movie’s December release date, this trailer could very well prove to be the last credible glimpse of what the film will include.

Here’s what time we can expect to be able to see it in the UK…

What time does the Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker trailer drop?

According to a post on the official Disney Twitter page, the final trailer for Star Wars Episode 9 will be landing tonight in the US during Monday Night Football.

This will air on American channel ESPN from 8:15pm EST (Eastern Standard Time), which is 1:15am Tuesday morning in the UK.

The final trailer. Tune in to Monday Night Football on @ESPN to watch it live. #TheRiseOfSkywalker pic.twitter.com/F5p6ptdh8k — Disney (@Disney) October 19, 2019

Advertisement

Advertisement

This likely means that the Star Wars trailer will be airing during the half-time ad break. This is usually at roughly 9:30pm EST, which is 2:30am Tuesday morning UK time.

After the trailer airs in the US, you’ll likely be able to find it uploaded on to the film’s official YouTube channel.

The previous two movies in the franchise, The Force Awakens and The Last Jedi, have both seen their trailers released this way.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

When is the Star Wars Episode 9 release date?

This latest and final instalment of the Skywalker saga will hit cinemas in the UK on 19 December 2019.

In it, we’ll see the return of Daisy Ridley as protagonist Rey, Oscar Isaac as pilot Poe Dameron, and John Boyega as the ex-Storm Trooper Finn.

Fans across the pond will have to wait an extra day, as the American release date isn’t until 20 December.

Star Wars Episode 9 will hit cinemas on December 19, 2019.

description: The final Rise of Skywalker trailer is due to land very soon. Here's what time we can expect to be able to see it in the UK...
